name: mag10
description: Me6tagenomic analysis enables the study of microbial communities, providing insights into their diversity and roles in various environments.
command: rm -rf prod_apps && git clone git@github.com:CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git && cd ./prod_apps/nextflow/mag/ && sh run_mag.sh

spec.label: input
spec.name: input
spec.description: CSV samplesheet file containing information about the samples in the experiment. (pattern: ^\S+\.csv$)

spec.label: single_end
spec.name: single_end
spec.description: Specifies that the input is single-end reads.

spec.label: assembly_input
spec.name: assembly_input
spec.description: Additional input CSV samplesheet containing information about pre-computed assemblies. When set, both read pre-processing and assembly are skipped and the pipeline begins at the binning stage. (pattern: ^\S+\.csv$)

spec.label: outdir
spec.name: outdir
spec.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.

spec.label: email
spec.name: email
spec.description: Email address for completion summary. (pattern: ^([a-zA-Z0-9_\-\.]+)@([a-zA-Z0-9_\-\.]+)\.([a-zA-Z]{2,5})$)

spec.label: multiqc_title
spec.name: multiqc_title
spec.description: MultiQC report title. Printed as page header, used for filename if not otherwise specified.

spec.label: multiqc_methods_description
spec.name: multiqc_methods_description
spec.description: Custom MultiQC yaml file containing HTML including a methods description.

spec.label: megahit_fix_cpu_1
spec.name: megahit_fix_cpu_1
spec.description: Fix number of CPUs for MEGAHIT to 1. Not increased with retries.

spec.label: spades_fix_cpus
spec.name: spades_fix_cpus
spec.description: Fix number of CPUs used by SPAdes. Not increased with retries.

spec.label: spadeshybrid_fix_cpus
spec.name: spadeshybrid_fix_cpus
spec.description: Fix number of CPUs used by SPAdes hybrid. Not increased with retries.

spec.label: metabat_rng_seed
spec.name: metabat_rng_seed
spec.description: RNG seed for MetaBAT2.

spec.label: clip_tool
spec.name: clip_tool
spec.description: Specify which adapter clipping tool to use.

spec.label: save_clipped_reads
spec.name: save_clipped_reads
spec.description: Specify to save the resulting clipped FASTQ files to --outdir.

spec.label: reads_minlength
spec.name: reads_minlength
spec.description: The minimum length of reads must have to be retained for downstream analysis.

spec.label: fastp_qualified_quality
spec.name: fastp_qualified_quality
spec.description: Minimum phred quality value of a base to be qualified in fastp.

spec.label: fastp_cut_mean_quality
spec.name: fastp_cut_mean_quality
spec.description: The mean quality requirement used for per read sliding window cutting by fastp.

spec.label: fastp_save_trimmed_fail
spec.name: fastp_save_trimmed_fail
spec.description: Save reads that fail fastp filtering in a separate file. Not used downstream.

spec.label: fastp_trim_polyg
spec.name: fastp_trim_polyg
spec.description: Turn on detecting and trimming of poly-G tails

spec.label: adapterremoval_minquality
spec.name: adapterremoval_minquality
spec.description: The minimum base quality for low-quality base trimming by AdapterRemoval.

spec.label: adapterremoval_trim_quality_stretch
spec.name: adapterremoval_trim_quality_stretch
spec.description: Turn on quality trimming by consecutive stretch of low quality bases, rather than by window.

spec.label: adapterremoval_adapter1
spec.name: adapterremoval_adapter1
spec.description: Forward read adapter to be trimmed by AdapterRemoval. (pattern: ^[ATGCRYKMSWBDHVN]*$)

spec.label: adapterremoval_adapter2
spec.name: adapterremoval_adapter2
spec.description: Reverse read adapter to be trimmed by AdapterRemoval for paired end data. (pattern: ^[ATGCRYKMSWBDHVN]*$)

spec.label: host_genome
spec.name: host_genome
spec.description: Name of iGenomes reference for host contamination removal.

spec.label: host_fasta
spec.name: host_fasta
spec.description: Fasta reference file for host contamination removal.

spec.label: host_fasta_bowtie2index
spec.name: host_fasta_bowtie2index
spec.description: Bowtie2 index directory corresponding to `--host_fasta` reference file for host contamination removal.

spec.label: host_removal_verysensitive
spec.name: host_removal_verysensitive
spec.description: Use the `--very-sensitive` instead of the`--sensitive`setting for Bowtie 2 to map reads against the host genome.

spec.label: host_removal_save_ids
spec.name: host_removal_save_ids
spec.description: Save the read IDs of removed host reads.

spec.label: save_hostremoved_reads
spec.name: save_hostremoved_reads
spec.description: Specify to save input FASTQ files with host reads removed to --outdir.

spec.label: keep_phix
spec.name: keep_phix
spec.description: Keep reads similar to the Illumina internal standard PhiX genome.

spec.label: skip_clipping
spec.name: skip_clipping
spec.description: Skip read preprocessing using fastp or adapterremoval.

spec.label: save_phixremoved_reads
spec.name: save_phixremoved_reads
spec.description: Specify to save input FASTQ files with phiX reads removed to --outdir.

spec.label: bbnorm
spec.name: bbnorm
spec.description: Run BBnorm to normalize sequence depth.

spec.label: bbnorm_target
spec.name: bbnorm_target
spec.description: Set BBnorm target maximum depth to this number.

spec.label: bbnorm_min
spec.name: bbnorm_min
spec.description: Set BBnorm minimum depth to this number.

spec.label: save_bbnorm_reads
spec.name: save_bbnorm_reads
spec.description: Save normalized read files to output directory.

spec.label: skip_adapter_trimming
spec.name: skip_adapter_trimming
spec.description: Skip removing adapter sequences from long reads.

spec.label: longreads_min_length
spec.name: longreads_min_length
spec.description: Discard any read which is shorter than this value.

spec.label: longreads_min_quality
spec.name: longreads_min_quality
spec.description: Discard any read which has a mean quality score lower than this value.

spec.label: longreads_keep_percent
spec.name: longreads_keep_percent
spec.description: Keep this percent of bases.

spec.label: longreads_length_weight
spec.name: longreads_length_weight
spec.description: The higher the more important is read length when choosing the best reads.

spec.label: keep_lambda
spec.name: keep_lambda
spec.description: Keep reads similar to the ONT internal standard Escherichia virus Lambda genome.

spec.label: save_lambdaremoved_reads
spec.name: save_lambdaremoved_reads
spec.description: Specify to save input FASTQ files with lamba reads removed  to --outdir.

spec.label: save_porechop_reads
spec.name: save_porechop_reads
spec.description: Specify to save the resulting clipped FASTQ files to --outdir.

spec.label: save_filtered_longreads
spec.name: save_filtered_longreads
spec.description: Specify to save the resulting length filtered long read FASTQ files to --outdir.

spec.label: longread_adaptertrimming_tool
spec.name: longread_adaptertrimming_tool
spec.description: Specify which long read adapter trimming tool to use.

spec.label: longread_filtering_tool
spec.name: longread_filtering_tool
spec.description: Specify which long read filtering tool to use.

spec.label: centrifuge_db
spec.name: centrifuge_db
spec.description: Database for taxonomic binning with centrifuge.

spec.label: kraken2_db
spec.name: kraken2_db
spec.description: Database for taxonomic binning with kraken2.

spec.label: krona_db
spec.name: krona_db
spec.description: Database for taxonomic binning with krona

spec.label: skip_krona
spec.name: skip_krona
spec.description: Skip creating a krona plot for taxonomic binning.

spec.label: cat_db
spec.name: cat_db
spec.description: Database for taxonomic classification of metagenome assembled genomes. Can be either a zipped file or a directory containing the extracted output of such.

spec.label: cat_db_generate
spec.name: cat_db_generate
spec.description: Generate CAT database.

spec.label: save_cat_db
spec.name: save_cat_db
spec.description: Save the CAT database generated when specified by `--cat_db_generate`.

spec.label: cat_official_taxonomy
spec.name: cat_official_taxonomy
spec.description: Only return official taxonomic ranks (Kingdom, Phylum, etc.) when running CAT.

spec.label: skip_gtdbtk
spec.name: skip_gtdbtk
spec.description: Skip the running of GTDB, as well as the automatic download of the database

spec.label: gtdb_db
spec.name: gtdb_db
spec.description: Specify the location of a GTDBTK database. Can be either an uncompressed directory or a `.tar.gz` archive. If not specified will be downloaded for you when GTDBTK or binning QC is not skipped.

spec.label: gtdb_mash
spec.name: gtdb_mash
spec.description: Specify the location of a GTDBTK mash database. If missing, GTDB-Tk will skip the ani_screening step

spec.label: gtdbtk_min_completeness
spec.name: gtdbtk_min_completeness
spec.description: Min. bin completeness (in %) required to apply GTDB-tk classification.

spec.label: gtdbtk_max_contamination
spec.name: gtdbtk_max_contamination
spec.description: Max. bin contamination (in %) allowed to apply GTDB-tk classification.

spec.label: gtdbtk_min_perc_aa
spec.name: gtdbtk_min_perc_aa
spec.description: Min. fraction of AA (in %) in the MSA for bins to be kept.

spec.label: gtdbtk_min_af
spec.name: gtdbtk_min_af
spec.description: Min. alignment fraction to consider closest genome.

spec.label: gtdbtk_pplacer_cpus
spec.name: gtdbtk_pplacer_cpus
spec.description: Number of CPUs used for the by GTDB-Tk run tool pplacer.

spec.label: gtdbtk_pplacer_useram
spec.name: gtdbtk_pplacer_useram
spec.description: Speed up pplacer step of GTDB-Tk by loading to memory.

spec.label: coassemble_group
spec.name: coassemble_group
spec.description: Co-assemble samples within one group, instead of assembling each sample separately.

spec.label: spades_options
spec.name: spades_options
spec.description: Additional custom options for SPAdes and SPAdesHybrid. Do not specify `--meta` as this will be added for you!

spec.label: spades_downstreaminput
spec.name: spades_downstreaminput
spec.description: Specify whether to use contigs or scaffolds assembled by SPAdes

spec.label: megahit_options
spec.name: megahit_options
spec.description: Additional custom options for MEGAHIT.

spec.label: skip_spades
spec.name: skip_spades
spec.description: Skip Illumina-only SPAdes assembly.

spec.label: skip_spadeshybrid
spec.name: skip_spadeshybrid
spec.description: Skip SPAdes hybrid assembly.

spec.label: skip_megahit
spec.name: skip_megahit
spec.description: Skip MEGAHIT assembly.

spec.label: skip_quast
spec.name: skip_quast
spec.description: Skip metaQUAST.

spec.label: skip_prodigal
spec.name: skip_prodigal
spec.description: Skip Prodigal gene prediction

spec.label: prokka_with_compliance
spec.name: prokka_with_compliance
spec.description: Turn on Prokka complicance mode for truncating contig names for NCBI/ENA compatibility.

spec.label: prokka_compliance_centre
spec.name: prokka_compliance_centre
spec.description: Specify sequencing centre name required for Prokka's compliance mode.

spec.label: skip_prokka
spec.name: skip_prokka
spec.description: Skip Prokka genome annotation.

spec.label: skip_metaeuk
spec.name: skip_metaeuk
spec.description: Skip MetaEuk gene prediction and annotation

spec.label: metaeuk_mmseqs_db
spec.name: metaeuk_mmseqs_db
spec.description: A string containing the name of one of the databases listed in the [mmseqs2 documentation](https://github.com/soedinglab/MMseqs2/wiki#downloading-databases). This database will be downloaded and formatted for eukaryotic genome annotation. Incompatible with --metaeuk_db.

spec.label: metaeuk_db
spec.name: metaeuk_db
spec.description: Path to either a local fasta file of protein sequences, or to a directory containing an MMseqs2-formatted database, for annotation of eukaryotic genomes.

spec.label: save_mmseqs_db
spec.name: save_mmseqs_db
spec.description: Save the downloaded mmseqs2 database specified in `--metaeuk_mmseqs_db`.

spec.label: run_virus_identification
spec.name: run_virus_identification
spec.description: Run virus identification.

spec.label: genomad_db
spec.name: genomad_db
spec.description: Database for virus classification with geNomad

spec.label: genomad_min_score
spec.name: genomad_min_score
spec.description: Minimum geNomad score for a sequence to be considered viral

spec.label: genomad_splits
spec.name: genomad_splits
spec.description: Number of groups that geNomad's MMSeqs2 databse should be split into (reduced memory requirements)

spec.label: binning_map_mode
spec.name: binning_map_mode
spec.description: Defines mapping strategy to compute co-abundances for binning, i.e. which samples will be mapped against the assembly.

spec.label: skip_binning
spec.name: skip_binning
spec.description: Skip metagenome binning entirely

spec.label: skip_metabat2
spec.name: skip_metabat2
spec.description: Skip MetaBAT2 Binning

spec.label: skip_maxbin2
spec.name: skip_maxbin2
spec.description: Skip MaxBin2 Binning

spec.label: skip_concoct
spec.name: skip_concoct
spec.description: Skip CONCOCT Binning

spec.label: min_contig_size
spec.name: min_contig_size
spec.description: Minimum contig size to be considered for binning and for bin quality check.

spec.label: min_length_unbinned_contigs
spec.name: min_length_unbinned_contigs
spec.description: Minimal length of contigs that are not part of any bin but treated as individual genome.

spec.label: max_unbinned_contigs
spec.name: max_unbinned_contigs
spec.description: Maximal number of contigs that are not part of any bin but treated as individual genome.

spec.label: bin_min_size
spec.name: bin_min_size
spec.description: Specify the shortest length a bin should be to retain for downstream processing (in base pairs)

spec.label: bin_max_size
spec.name: bin_max_size
spec.description: Specify the longest length a bin should be to retain for downstream processing (in base pairs). By default no limit.

spec.label: bin_concoct_chunksize
spec.name: bin_concoct_chunksize
spec.description: Specify length of sub-contigs cut up prior CONCOCT binning

spec.label: bin_concoct_overlap
spec.name: bin_concoct_overlap
spec.description: Specify the overlap between each sub-contig prior CONCOCT binning

spec.label: bin_concoct_donotconcatlast
spec.name: bin_concoct_donotconcatlast
spec.description: Specify to not append the last contig less than sub-contig length to the last correct length contig

spec.label: bowtie2_mode
spec.name: bowtie2_mode
spec.description: Specify alternative Bowtie2 settings for aligning reads back against the assembly. (pattern: ^[-\w]*$)

spec.label: save_assembly_mapped_reads
spec.name: save_assembly_mapped_reads
spec.description: Save the output of mapping raw reads back to assembled contigs

spec.label: bin_domain_classification
spec.name: bin_domain_classification
spec.description: Enable domain-level (prokaryote or eukaryote) classification of bins using Tiara. Processes which are domain-specific will then only receive bins matching the domain requirement.

spec.label: tiara_min_length
spec.name: tiara_min_length
spec.description: Minimum contig length for Tiara to use for domain classification. For accurate classification, should be longer than 3000 bp.

spec.label: exclude_unbins_from_postbinning
spec.name: exclude_unbins_from_postbinning
spec.description: Exclude unbinned contigs in the post-binning steps (bin QC, taxonomic classification, and annotation steps).

spec.label: skip_binqc
spec.name: skip_binqc
spec.description: Disable bin QC with BUSCO, CheckM or CheckM2.

spec.label: binqc_tool
spec.name: binqc_tool
spec.description: Specify which tool for bin quality-control validation to use.

spec.label: busco_db
spec.name: busco_db
spec.description: Download URL, local tar.gz archive, or local uncompressed directory for an *_odb10 or *_odb12 BUSCO lineage dataset.

spec.label: busco_db_lineage
spec.name: busco_db_lineage
spec.description: Name of the BUSCO *_odb10 or *_odb12 lineage to check against. Additionally supports 'auto', 'auto_prok' and 'auto_euk' for automatic lineage selection mode. (pattern: (.*_odb(10|12))|auto(_prok|_euk)?$)

spec.label: save_busco_db
spec.name: save_busco_db
spec.description: Save the used BUSCO lineage datasets provided via `--busco_db`.

spec.label: busco_clean
spec.name: busco_clean
spec.description: Enable clean-up of temporary files created during BUSCO runs.

spec.label: checkm_db
spec.name: checkm_db
spec.description: Path to local folder containing already downloaded and uncompressed CheckM database.

spec.label: save_checkm_data
spec.name: save_checkm_data
spec.description: Save the used CheckM reference files downloaded when not using --checkm_db parameter.

spec.label: checkm2_db
spec.name: checkm2_db
spec.description: Path to local file of an already downloaded and uncompressed CheckM2 database (.dmnd file).

spec.label: checkm2_db_version
spec.name: checkm2_db_version
spec.description: CheckM2 database version number to download (Zenodo record ID, for reference check the canonical reference https://zenodo.org/records/5571251, and pick the Zenodo ID of the database version of your choice).

spec.label: save_checkm2_data
spec.name: save_checkm2_data
spec.description: Save the used CheckM2 reference files downloaded when not using --checkm2_db parameter.

spec.label: refine_bins_dastool
spec.name: refine_bins_dastool
spec.description: Turn on bin refinement using DAS Tool.

spec.label: refine_bins_dastool_threshold
spec.name: refine_bins_dastool_threshold
spec.description: Specify single-copy gene score threshold for bin refinement.

spec.label: postbinning_input
spec.name: postbinning_input
spec.description: Specify which binning output is sent for downstream annotation, taxonomic classification, bin quality control etc.

spec.label: run_gunc
spec.name: run_gunc
spec.description: Turn on GUNC genome chimerism checks

spec.label: gunc_db
spec.name: gunc_db
spec.description: Specify a path to a pre-downloaded GUNC dmnd database file

spec.label: gunc_database_type
spec.name: gunc_database_type
spec.description: Specify which database to auto-download if not supplying own

spec.label: gunc_save_db
spec.name: gunc_save_db
spec.description: Save the used GUNC reference files downloaded when not using --gunc_db parameter.

spec.label: ancient_dna
spec.name: ancient_dna
spec.description: Turn on/off the ancient DNA subworfklow

spec.label: pydamage_accuracy
spec.name: pydamage_accuracy
spec.description: PyDamage accuracy threshold

spec.label: skip_ancient_damagecorrection
spec.name: skip_ancient_damagecorrection
spec.description: deactivate damage correction of ancient contigs using variant and consensus calling

spec.label: freebayes_ploidy
spec.name: freebayes_ploidy
spec.description: Ploidy for variant calling

spec.label: freebayes_min_basequality
spec.name: freebayes_min_basequality
spec.description: minimum base quality required for variant calling

spec.label: freebayes_minallelefreq
spec.name: freebayes_minallelefreq
spec.description: minimum minor allele frequency for considering variants

spec.label: bcftools_view_high_variant_quality
spec.name: bcftools_view_high_variant_quality
spec.description: minimum genotype quality for considering a variant high quality

spec.label: bcftools_view_medium_variant_quality
spec.name: bcftools_view_medium_variant_quality
spec.description: minimum genotype quality for considering a variant medium quality

spec.label: bcftools_view_minimal_allelesupport
spec.name: bcftools_view_minimal_allelesupport
spec.description: minimum number of bases supporting the alternative allele
